tool_description: Returns LIVE amount of US National Debt, Tax revenue and 20+ more stats. Also returns detailed finance data on for the US and major countries.
name: Global Economy Analytics
title: Global Economy Analytics

api_list.name: Get gold demand by country
api_list.description: returns realtime gold demand by country
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-economy-analytics.p.rapidapi.com/goldDemandByCountryInOunces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-economy-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:
import requests

url = "https://global-economy-analytics.p.rapidapi.com/goldDemandByCountryInOunces"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-economy-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Specific Country economic stats, forecast, news
api_list.description:
This specific country endpoint returns top 30 countries:

Realtime Economic states: population, national debt, GDP, public debt to gdp ratio, external debt to gdp ratio

Economic summary: economic forecast YTD, economic outlook

Realtime latest economic news: top ten latest articles, various sources
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://global-economy-analytics.p.rapidapi.com/country/Saudi Arabia"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-economy-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())
api_list.convert_code:

headers = {

            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "global-economy-analytics.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

        }
